reviews.text: This staff is very rude firstly i buy candy for my niece and she didn‚Äôt ask me my member card and im telling her i have member card and i tell her my first 3 number but she just froze there with rude eye staring at me and then she ask ‚Äúlagi?‚Äù so i tell her my full number phone and I just let it slip but when my sisters pay at the counter she did it again never ask for my sister member card and when my sister tell the staff her number she type it wrong and yelled for void and ask my sister to write at the paper with rude attitude and very unpleasant vibe please watson brief your staff to serve customer with welcoming vibe the beauty advisor is very friendly but the cashier was bery rude here I attached the rude staff please educate her. Thank you in advance

Convenient, more products and perhaps for make up tester the staff will more particular update. Especially on cotton pads with makeup remover. Overall, the staffs are friendly and serve good service with good recommendations
Big outlet. Pleasant to browse in. Has everything you need.

I went around 9.50 today to just grab a deodorant quickly. But they've already locked tye door and said it was closed. When I checked in google it said that they are open until 10pm. Kindly clarify things. Don't provide wrong informations and mislead customers.
